name: Toy nerf guns game - Gun Cars
name_original: Toy nerf guns game - Gun Cars
description:
Full nerf style!
Play long-distance jumping challenges with the long-jump ramp and obstacles. Awesome stunts and tracks bring the exciting gameplay to life!

Racing, toy and yellow cars make game more challenging.

NOTE: You can play with buttons or by tilting your phone. Refer to settings for choosing controls
